Conferences

In computer graphics community, Ke-Sen’s homepage is really popular. It lists all the recent conference papers, their stats and many resources for learning computer graphics.

The key computer graphics research conferences are (sorted by technical papers’ deadlines):

Conference Date Paper Deadline
SIGGRAPH August Start Jan End
EGSR (Eurographics Symposium on Rendering) July Start April Start
SCA (Symposium on Computer Animation) July Mid April Start
HPG (High Performance Graphics) August Start April Mid
3DV (Internation Conference on 3D Vision) September Start May End
SA (SIGGRAPH ASIA) December Start June Start
EUROGRAPHICS April Mid October Start
